description: Implements CISA BOD 25-01 security controls for Microsoft 365 (Azure AD/Entra ID).

clientId.description: The client ID for the Azure AD application.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the Microsoft 365 setup.

clientSecret.description: The client secret for the Azure AD application.

tools.name: block_legacy_auth
tools.description: Block legacy authentication (MS.AAD.1.1v1)

tools.name: block_high_risk_users
tools.description: Block users detected as high risk (MS.AAD.2.1v1)

tools.name: block_high_risk_signins
tools.description: Block sign-ins detected as high risk (MS.AAD.2.3v1)

tools.name: enforce_phishing_resistant_mfa
tools.description: Enforce phishing-resistant MFA for all users (MS.AAD.3.1v1)

tools.name: enforce_alternative_mfa
tools.description: Enforce alternative MFA method if phishing-resistant MFA not enforced (MS.AAD.3.2v1)

tools.name: configure_authenticator_context
tools.description: Configure Microsoft Authenticator to show login context (MS.AAD.3.3v1)

tools.name: complete_auth_methods_migration
tools.description: Set Authentication Methods Manage Migration to Complete (MS.AAD.3.4v1)

tools.name: enforce_privileged_mfa
tools.description: Enforce phishing-resistant MFA for privileged roles (MS.AAD.3.6v1)

tools.name: restrict_app_registration
tools.description: Allow only administrators to register applications (MS.AAD.5.1v1)

tools.name: restrict_app_consent
tools.description: Allow only administrators to consent to applications (MS.AAD.5.2v1)

tools.name: configure_admin_consent
tools.description: Configure admin consent workflow for applications (MS.AAD.5.3v1)

tools.name: restrict_group_consent
tools.description: Prevent group owners from consenting to applications (MS.AAD.5.4v1)

tools.name: disable_password_expiry
tools.description: Disable password expiration (MS.AAD.6.1v1)

tools.name: configure_global_admins
tools.description: Configure Global Administrator role assignments (MS.AAD.7.1v1)

userIds.description: List of user IDs to assign Global Administrator role

tools.name: enforce_granular_roles
tools.description: Enforce use of granular roles instead of Global Administrator (MS.AAD.7.2v1)

tools.name: enforce_cloud_accounts
tools.description: Enforce cloud-only accounts for privileged users (MS.AAD.7.3v1)

tools.name: enforce_pam
tools.description: Enforce PAM system for privileged role assignments (MS.AAD.7.5v1)

tools.name: configure_global_admin_approval
tools.description: Configure approval requirement for Global Administrator activation (MS.AAD.7.6v1)

tools.name: configure_role_alerts
tools.description: Configure alerts for privileged role assignments (MS.AAD.7.7v1)

notificationEmails.description: Email addresses to notify on role assignments

tools.name: configure_admin_alerts
tools.description: Configure alerts for Global Administrator activation (MS.AAD.7.8v1)

notificationEmails.description: Email addresses to notify on role activation

tools.name: get_policy_status
tools.description: Get current status of all CISA M365 security policies
